block.p: Several New York City and New Jersey television stations plan live coverage of inauguration day events in New Jersey. WCBS-TV, Channel 2: Live coverage on noon news program.
WNBC-TV, Channel 4: Special half-hour report beginning at noon.
FOX, Channel 5: Live coverage on noon news program.
WABC-TV, Channel 7: Live coverage on noon news program.
WPIX-TV, Channel 11: Live and taped coverage on 10 P.M. news program.

NEW JERSEY CHANNEL, Channel 50: Live coverage of the inauguration, beginning at 11 A.M. and lasting at least two hours, depending on the weather. From 8 to 9 P.M., the network will broadcast live from the inaugural ball. Additional coverage on 6 and 10 P.M. news programs.
